archiefmat.titel_eng: Documents related to affairs of slaves
archiefmat.scope: Contains documents regarding among other things manumission, taxes on slaves, and petitions for permission to move slaves from one property to another. It also contains petitions to correct information in the slave registers (death and desertion of slaves; transfer to another plantation etc.)
archiefmat.notes: The numbers of the inventory items may be changed (November 2008).
archiefmat.Aantekeningen: NB de nummering kan mogelijk nog wijzigen; het archief wordt op dit moment (november 2008) omgenummerd. Later nazien!
